userStories.title: Refactor ArticleGroups card to compact layout with expandable content
acceptanceCriteria: Refactor src/components/article/ArticleGroups.tsx
Card split into 2 sections: Summary (always visible) + Details (collapsible)
Summary section contains: Badge, Header (title, rating, logo), Key Stats, Best For, Pros/Cons
Details section contains: ReactMarkdown content (Overview, Key Features, Price)
Use shadcn/ui Collapsible for expandable details
Footer with 2 buttons side-by-side: 'Read full review' (ghost/outline) + 'Visit Site' (green, narrower ~50% width)
'Read full review' toggles Collapsible open/closed
Button shows ChevronDown icon, rotates 180deg when open
Button text changes to 'Hide review' when expanded
Details content remains in HTML for SEO (uses CSS height animation, not conditional render)
First card in list has details expanded by default
